thread.title: Grenade blast in Jolo bakeshop kills 4
thread.title_full: Grenade blast in Jolo bakeshop kills 4

title: Grenade blast in Jolo bakeshop kills 4
text: Grenade blast in Jolo bakeshop kills 4 By Roel Pareño   10:30am Authorities have yet to disclose the name of the suspect. Google Earth ZAMBOANGA CITY, Philippines — A grenade explosion in a bakeshop in Jolo, Sulu killed four people and injured 15 others on Saturday night. Col. Cirilito Sobejana, commander of Joint Task Force Sulu, said the suspect lobbed a grenade at the Karina Grocery and Bakeshop at Sitio Lambayong in Barangay Bus-bus. Four people were killed on the spot by the explosion. A suspect was arrested but his name was not immediately made available, Sobejana said. According to reports from the Jolo Police Station, the attacker was a suspected burglar who threw the grenade to escape pursuing police personnel in the area.
